L2 Regularization Example
----------------------------

Here is the documentation and usage example for `l2_regularization.py`:

.. automodule:: L2_Reg.l2_regularization
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

Example usage:
----------------

.. code-block:: python
    :caption: Example code for L2 Regularization

    from L2_Reg.l2_regularization import L2Regularization

    reg = L2Regularization()
    loss = reg.compute_loss(data)
    print(loss)
